title: Send file or non-printable character in Immunity Debugger arguments
content:
I am a beginner in Reverse Engineering.
I am on Windows and using Immunity Debugger.
I would like to send my payload on the .exe file.
The payload contains non-printable characters.
How I can launch the process in Immunity Debugger with this kind of payload ?
I cannot attach the process separately: it crashes instantly with the payload and I want to know why in Immunity Debugger.
I am OK with other solutions if any.
Thanks!
